::KitKat::

She looked up at Bludgeon. "You come with me.  If it is an ambush, I 
want some fire power at my side.  But I will need the other three to 
stay back as backup incase slag happens."

> :::Bludgeon:::
> 
> ::He walks to the source of the conversation, but he only hears 
KitKat giving 
> orders::
> Bludgeon: Hey, What are my orders?
